mapper.select: select id, label, permission from tenon_menu tm where status = 1 and exists(select 1 from tenon_role_menu trm where trm.id_tenon_menu = tm.id and trm.id_tenon_role = #{idRole})

select id, label, permission from tenon_menu tm where status = 1 and exists(select 1 from tenon_role_menu trm where trm.id_tenon_menu = tm.id and exists(select 1 from tenon_user_role tur where tur.id_tenon_role = trm.id_tenon_role and tur.id_tenon_user = #{idUser}))

select id, label, permission, parent_id, sort, menu_type, icon, href from tenon_menu tm where status = 1 and menu_type = 0 and parent_id = #{parentId} and exists(select 1 from tenon_role_menu trm where trm.id_tenon_menu = tm.id and exists(select 1 from tenon_user_role tur where tur.id_tenon_role = trm.id_tenon_role and tur.id_tenon_user = #{idUser}))
